# Aufgabe 1: Forbes 2000

```{r}
dtforbes = data.table(fread("./Forbes2000.csv"))
str(dtforbes)
```

## Sales
```{r}
dtforbes[,list(
  Min = min(sales),
  Median = median(sales),
  Max = max(sales),
  SD = sd(sales)
)]
```


## Profits
```{r}
dtforbes[,list(
  Min = min(profits),
  Median = median(profits),
  Max = max(profits),
  SD = sd(profits)
)]
```

## Assets
```{r}
dtforbes[,list(
  Min = min(assets),
  Median = median(assets),
  Max = max(assets),
  SD = sd(assets)
)]
```

## Marketvalue
```{r}
dtforbes[,list(
```
